description: Adds support for Android Dex files

installinstructions.Linux: Just copy to plugin directory. Requires python >= 3.8
installinstructions.Darwin: Untested on macOS. Just copy to plugin directory. Requires python >= 3.8
installinstructions.Windows: Just copy to plugin directory. Requires python >= 3.8. Lightly tested on Windows.
